scripts.doc: npm run doc1 && npm run doc2 && npm run doc3 && npm run doc4 && npm run doc5 && npm run doc6 && npm run doc7
scripts.doc1: npx depcruise --collapse 3 --config ./depcruise-config.js --focus '^src/components' --exclude '^node_modules|.json|.css|.mp3' --output-type dot ./src | dot -T svg > dependencygraph1.svg
scripts.doc2: npx depcruise --config ./depcruise-config.js --focus '^src/components' --exclude '^node_modules|.json|.css|.mp3' --output-type dot ./src | dot -T svg > dependencygraph2.svg
scripts.doc3: npx depcruise --config ./depcruise-config.js --focus '^src/components/Chessboard' --exclude '^node_modules|.json' --output-type dot ./src/components/Chessboard | dot -T svg > dependencygraph3.svg
scripts.doc4: npx depcruise --config ./depcruise-config.js --focus '^src/components/FreeBoard' --exclude '^node_modules|.json' --output-type dot ./src/components/FreeBoard | dot -T svg > dependencygraph4.svg
scripts.doc5: npx depcruise --config ./depcruise-config.js --focus '^src/components/MultiplayerGame' --exclude '^node_modules|.json' --output-type dot ./src/components/MultiplayerGame | dot -T svg > dependencygraph5.svg
scripts.doc6: npx depcruise --config ./depcruise-config.js --focus '^src/components/ComputerGame' --exclude '^node_modules|.json' --output-type dot ./src/components/ComputerGame | dot -T svg > dependencygraph6.svg
scripts.doc7: npx depcruise --config ./depcruise-config.js --focus '^src/components/Room' --exclude '^node_modules|.json' --output-type dot ./src/components/Room | dot -T svg > dependencygraph7.svg
